code: import{loadUsers}from"./loadUsers";export var editUser=function editUser(_ref){var id=_ref.id,name=_ref.name,phone=_ref.phone,email=_ref.email,userId=_ref.userId;return function(dispatch){var options={method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json;charset=utf-8"},body:JSON.stringify({editedUser:"update peoples set name='".concat(name,"', email='").concat(email,"', phone='").concat(phone,"', idaccess=").concat(userId," where id=").concat(id,";")})};fetch("http://localhost:4000/editUser",options).then(function(res){return res.text();}).then(function(data){dispatch(loadUsers({userId:localStorage.userId/1}));}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};
